supportOptions.title: Sponsor a Project
supportOptions.description: Support innovative research projects and help bring new ideas to life.

supportOptions.title: Equipment Donation
supportOptions.description: Donate equipment or resources to enhance our lab facilities.

supportOptions.title: Corporate Partnership
supportOptions.description: Partner with us for research, innovation, and talent development.

volunteerOpportunities.title: Event Coordinator
volunteerOpportunities.description: Help organize and manage community events, workshops, and conferences.

volunteerOpportunities.title: Mentor
volunteerOpportunities.description: Share your expertise and guide aspiring innovators in their projects.

volunteerOpportunities.title: Lab Assistant
volunteerOpportunities.description: Support day-to-day operations and assist with research projects.

volunteerOpportunities.title: Community Ambassador
volunteerOpportunities.description: Represent the lab at events and help build our community network.
